content: around - join to beginning 3rd chain of the round 6 v-st round 6-18 repeat round 2-5 making the hole for the middle finger you can just wear the glove as is or you can make a hole for your midd - pick one of the pretty shells from your prev round - attach your yarn to the first double_crochet of the shell chain 7 or the number of cha width - skip 3 st and slip_stitch in the next double_crochet break the yarn and weave in ends - click for more patterns in my ravelry store c 2017 / elena madsen designs pattern video c 2017 / elena madsen designs
